title.en: A Prayer Based on the Liberational Life of the Omniscient Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo

text.en: You have understood the nature and extent of all that can be known;
text.en-trans: ji ta jinyé sheja tamché khyen

text.en: With non-referential compassion, you regard beings as your children;
text.en-trans: mikmé tukjé dro la bu tar gong

text.en: Dharma sovereign, capable of emptying saṃsāra from its very depths—
text.en-trans: khorwa dongtruk nüpé chö kyi gyal

text.en: Noble Khyentse Wangpo, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: khyentsé wangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: The only father of the victorious buddhas is venerable Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: gyalwé yab chik jetsün jampé yang

text.en: Whose manifestations, taming as needed, pervade the dharmadhātu.
text.en-trans: gang dul namrol chöying khyabpa lé

text.en: As one among them, you purposely took birth in this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü ten dro kyobpé palgön du

text.en: To become a glorious protector of teachings and beings—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: samzhin kyewa zhé la solwa deb

text.en: In a medicinal valley in Domé, land of fourfold well-being and tenfold virtue,1
text.en-trans: do mé dé zhi gé chü men gyi jong

text.en: Among the manifest regions for taming beings through enlightened activity,
text.en-trans: trinlé dro dul trulpé né kyi char

text.en: Having applied the five supreme considerations, such as purity of family line,
text.en-trans: namdak rik sok chok gi zikpa ngé

text.en: You demonstrated taking birth as a nirmāṇakāya—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: trulpé ku ru ten la solwa deb

text.en: With one voice, supreme guides possessing wisdom
text.en-trans: yeshe nyepé namdren chok nam kyi

text.en: Prophesied that you would become a sublime individual,
text.en-trans: dampé kyebur drin chik lungten ching

text.en: And, as you transcended ordinary conduct, everyone, human and divine,
text.en-trans: palpé chö lé dé chir lhami kün

text.en: Praised you as a lord among beings—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drowé gön du ngak la solwa deb

text.en: You travelled throughout Ü, Tsang, and Greater Tibet,
text.en-trans: ütsang bö chen küntu zhab kyi chak

text.en: Relying on more than a hundred teachers, whom you delighted in the three ways.2
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi yongdzin gya lhak ten

text.en: Tirelessly you searched high and low for the sacred Dharma.
text.en-trans: kyongal mepar damchö yongsu tsol

text.en: To you, the one whose intention is immeasurable, I pray.
text.en-trans: tukkyé pakyé khyö la solwa deb

text.en: While you were meditating in Sachen Kunga Nyingpo’s cave,
text.en-trans: sa chen puk tu tukdam dzepé tsé

text.en: The mudrā of the supreme deity dissolved into your heart,
text.en-trans: lhakpé lha yi chakgya tukkar tim

text.en: Releasing the eight great treasures of courageous eloquence.
text.en-trans: pobpé terchen gyepo yongsu drol

text.en: To you, whose potential for twofold knowledge was perfected, I pray.
text.en-trans: khyen nyi tsal chen dzok la solwa deb

text.en: Linguistics, logic, the arts, medicine, calculation, poetry and the rest—
text.en-trans: dratsé zo so drang né tsik gyen sok

text.en: As you perfectly mastered the five fields of knowledge
text.en-trans: né ngarikpa yenlak dang chepar

text.en: And their branches, your reputation for scholarship
text.en-trans: pul du sönpé gangchen dzinmé khong

text.en: Reached throughout the Land of Snows—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khepé nyenpé khyab la solwa deb

text.en: By merely glancing at the texts of the Vinaya, Middle Way, Prajñāpāramitā,
text.en-trans: dul ngön uma parchin sang ngak kyi

text.en: And the tantras of the Secret Mantra you realized their deepest meaning.
text.en-trans: gyü künzikpa tsam gyi ting leb ching

text.en: You gained infallible powers of mnemonic retention
text.en-trans: mi jé zung tob tenpé khorlö tsul

text.en: And clearly displayed the qualities of Sthiracakra3—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ma bé salwar tön la solwa deb

text.en: The jewelled ornaments of your immaculate discipline are enchanting;
text.en-trans: drimé tsultrim norbü gyenché gek

text.en: The smiling countenance of your concentration captivates the fortunate;
text.en-trans: tingdzin dzum kar kalden yiwang guk

text.en: And the graceful play of your wisdom delights the three worlds—
text.en-trans: sherab rol gek sa sum chi du yo

text.en: To you, the mighty lord of threefold training, I pray.
text.en-trans: lab sum wangchuk zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Your dharmic vision of the profound and vast is unsullied;
text.en-trans: zabgyé né la chö chen dul dangdral

text.en: You are unhindered in exposition, debate and composition;
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsom la chak dang tokpamé

text.en: And in all your actions you are uncontaminated by delusion—
text.en-trans: dzechö kün la trulpé drima zé

text.en: To you, who induces confidence in gods and men, I pray.
text.en-trans: lhami yiché kyé la solwa deb

text.en: You conceal your own virtues like treasure in the ocean;
text.en-trans: rang gi yönten gyatsö ter zhin bé

text.en: You commend and revere the slightest attributes of others;
text.en-trans: zhen gyi yönten tramor ngak shing dü

text.en: For the sake of the teachings and beings, you give away
text.en-trans: ten drö döndu ché gü dokpa yang

text.en: Like hay even your most prized possessions—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsa zhin tongwar dzé la solwa deb

text.en: With oceanic powers of memory, meditation and higher perception,
text.en-trans: zung dang tingdzin ngönshé gyatso nga

text.en: You are truly someone who deserves the three worlds’ veneration,
text.en-trans: jikten sum gyi chö'ö nyi gyur kyang

text.en: Yet you are not arrogant and have gladly endured hardship
text.en-trans: kheng drek mi nga damchö tsik chik chir

text.en: Even for the sake of a single word of sacred Dharma—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: kachen dang du zhé la solwa deb

text.en: Since you were never involved in any mundane activities
text.en-trans: tarnang chö la nyepé dzin kyong sok

text.en: Superficially related to the Dharma, such as administration,
text.en-trans: jikten jazhak gangla ang tö mepé

text.en: You remain like a fearless lion, your activity always perfect—
text.en-trans: jikmé sengé tabur kunzang chö

text.en: To the one who is without rival on this earth, I pray.
text.en-trans: sateng drenda dral la solwa deb

text.en: All the rivers of scriptures, explanatory instructions and pith advice
text.en-trans: drubgyü shingta ché gyé ringluk kyi

text.en: From the traditions of the eight great chariots of the practice lineage
text.en-trans: zhung dam mengak chulung malüpa

text.en: Merged in the sea of your heart, and with a stream of ripening and liberation
text.en-trans: tuk tsor kyil né mindrol gyün bebpé

text.en: You enhance the vital channel of the teachings—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tenpé soktsa tü la solwa deb

text.en: Great charioteer for the entire teaching of Śākyamuni Buddha,
text.en-trans: tubten yongsu dzokpé shingta ché

text.en: You are a friend who impartially trains all those to be disciplined
text.en-trans: dulja ri su ma ché dulwé nyen

text.en: And does not fall into sectarian bias, a jewel upon the crowns
text.en-trans: chok su ma lhung drubta tadak gi

text.en: Of all the various schools and tenet systems—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsuk gi norbur gyur la solwa deb

text.en: All your activity is performed solely for the benefit of others;
text.en-trans: trinlé tamché zhenpen bazhik drub

text.en: You possess wondrous signs of making every connection count.
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden ngotsar té mang nga

text.en: The vast merit you have accumulated is beyond imagining;
text.en-trans: sönam tsokchen sam mi khyabpa trün

text.en: Mighty lord of the tenth bhūmi, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: sa chü wangchuk khyö la solwa deb

text.en: The Guru of Oḍḍiyāna and consort, the noble Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: orgyen yabyum drimé shenyen zhab

text.en: The ancestral dharma kings, Chöwang,4Omniscient Longchenpa,
text.en-trans: chögyal mé wön chö wang künkhyen sok

text.en: And the rest—gurus of the ninefold lineage and the yidam deities
text.en-trans: guden gyüpé lama yidam lhé

text.en: All conferred their blessings and siddhis upon you—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jinlab ngödrub tsal la solwa deb

text.en: The great benevolent one,5the uncles6and nephews7and their lineage
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpo khu wön gyü ché kyi

text.en: Bestowed empowerments on you and entrusted you with tantras;
text.en-trans: wangkur gyü té zhenyang pak bö kyi

text.en: And numerous Indian and Tibetan scholars and adepts came to you
text.en-trans: khedrub dumé ngö nyam milam du

text.en: Directly and in dreams and repeatedly held you in their care—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: yangyang jesu zung la solwa deb

text.en: The master Mañjuśrīmitra, in particular, transmitted to you
text.en-trans: khyepar lobpön jampal shenyen gyi

text.en: The secret treasury of sūtra and tantra, and by blessing you
text.en-trans: dogyü sangdzö tsal né yeshe kur

text.en: In his wisdom form fully awakened your wisdom realization,
text.en-trans: jin gyi labpé nyi dang yermé pé

text.en: Indivisible from his own—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyen tok dzokpar sé la solwa deb

text.en: As you entered the maṇḍala of Gathered Intentions, the power of
text.en-trans: düpé dal du zhuk tsé so tön chok

text.en: The sublime Sotön Yeshe Wangchuk cleansed your impure aggregates and elements
text.en-trans: yé wang tu yi nyikmé pung kham jang

text.en: And transformed them into the three secrets of Vajrasattva.
text.en-trans: dorjé sempé sangwa sum du gyur

text.en: Supreme, omnipresent lord of all families, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rik kün khyab dak chok la solwa deb

text.en: The Vajra Queen, mother of the victorious ones, accepted you;
text.en-trans: gyalyum dorjé tsün mö jesu zung

text.en: Appearance and existence arose as maṇḍalas, pure and infinite;
text.en-trans: nangsi dakpa rabjam khorlor shar

text.en: And you clearly perceived the maṇḍala of the vajra body—
text.en-trans: dorjé lü kyi kyilkhor salwar zik

text.en: Foremost of siddhas, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drubpé khyuchok khyö la solwa deb

text.en: For you, the ḍākinīs gathered in the three abodes, outer and inner,
text.en-trans: chinang né sum khandrö duwa tob

text.en: The wisdom of the three forms of blazing intensified,
text.en-trans: barwa sum gyi yeshe gong du pel

text.en: And you perfected the auspicious interconnection of threefold conduct—
text.en-trans: chöpa sum gyi tendrel tarchinpé

text.en: Great lord of yogis, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Your karmic propensity from numerous past lives was activated,
text.en-trans: kyerab dumé lé kyi tro sé dé

text.en: And you collected volumes of rarely transmitted instructions of sūtra and tantra,
text.en-trans: dogyü kalung könpé putika

text.en: As well as supreme representations and sacred substances, like countless rivers
text.en-trans: ten chok damdzé chulung jewa nyé

text.en: All brought together within the ocean of your life of liberation—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: namtar gyatsor kyil la solwa deb

text.en: By receiving the six lineages—earth and mind treasures,
text.en-trans: gyüpa drukden sa dang gongpé ter

text.en: Pure visions, aural transmissions, recollections and rediscovered treasures—
text.en-trans: daknang nyengyü jedren yangter ché

text.en: You acquired the kingdom of the seven precious transmissions.8
text.en-trans: kabab rinchen nam dün gyalsi nyé

text.en: Universal sovereign of Dharma, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chö kyi khorlö gyur la solwa deb

text.en: Having mastered your own perception, you overpower that of others;
text.en-trans: rangnang wang dü zhennang zil gyi nen

text.en: Even without applying effort, you accomplish the four kinds of activity;
text.en-trans: mabepar yang trinlé nam zhi drub

text.en: And ḍākinīs, dharma guardians and powerful haughty spirits
text.en-trans: daki chösung tuden drekpa yi

text.en: Are at your beck and call, fulfilling your commands—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chi chol ka zhin drub la solwa deb

text.en: Through countless turnings of the Dharma Wheel, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zabgyé chö kyi khorlo drangmepé

text.en: You matured and liberated as many fortunate ones as there are grains of sand.
text.en-trans: kalden jé nyé min ching drolwar dzé

text.en: Master of a sublime and inconceivable life of liberation,
text.en-trans: sam gyi mi khyab pakpé namtar chang

text.en: Embodiment of compassion, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tukjé daknyi khyé la solwa deb

text.en: You who demonstrated the conclusion of your vision for this world,
text.en-trans: zhing dir zikpa yolwé tsul ten tsé

text.en: By merging as one in the basic space of wisdom intent with Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: trulzhi dang sil tsemo ngapa ru

text.en: Crown adornment of five hundred paṇḍitas and basis of your emanation,
text.en-trans: ngabgyé tsukgyen drimé shenyen dang

text.en: At the Clear and Cool Five-Peaked Mountain—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gong ying chik tu gyur la solwa deb

text.en: Then once more, in the perception of those to be trained however necessary,
text.en-trans: lar yang gang dul duljé nang ngo ru

text.en: You displayed emanations of body, speech, mind, qualities, and activity,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk dang yönten trinlé kyi

text.en: Thereby to fulfil hopes and aspirations for the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: trulpa dumé ten drö rewa kong

text.en: To you whose contribution to beings’ welfare is without limit, I pray.
text.en-trans: dro dön pata yé la solwa deb

text.en: When you, O protector, awaken as the great All-Seeing One,9
text.en-trans: gön khyö küntu zikpa chenpo der

text.en: May we have the fortune to share in your supreme enlightenment
text.en-trans: ngön tsang gya tsé khor gyi tokma ru

text.en: By being among the very first in your retinue,
text.en-trans: dakchak changchub chok gi kalwar den

text.en: And by serving you as that victorious one.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dé yi zhabdring jepar shok

text.en: Through the power of praying single-pointedly with unwavering devotion,
text.en-trans: miché güpé tsechik soltab tü

text.en: May I never be apart from you, the supreme and glorious guru,
text.en-trans: kyewa di zung changchub matob bar

text.en: Henceforth from this life until I attain awakening,
text.en-trans: palden lama chok dang mindral bar

text.en: And may you guide and care for me until I realize liberation.
text.en-trans: jesu zung né namtar ngön jé shok

text.en: By following you properly through the three means of delight,
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi tsulzhin ten né kyang

text.en: May I receive the essence of your wisdom and complete my practice.
text.en-trans: tuk kyi chü tob nyamlen ta ru chin

text.en: May I fully perfect all the qualities of the paths and bhūmis
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi yönten yongdzok té

text.en: And ultimately attain the level of the mighty Vajradhara!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang wang gopang drub gyur chik

text.en: May there be no obstacles as I practise in accordance with the Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö zhin drub la barché minjung zhing

text.en: And as I gain mastery of the Dharma of scripture and realization,
text.en-trans: lungtok chö la rangwang jorpa yi

text.en: May I spread the Buddha’s teachings throughout this world of ours,
text.en-trans: sangye tenpa dzamling khyabpar pel

text.en: And come to be your equal, O sovereign of Dharma!
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalpo khyé dang tsungpar shok
